section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on December 29, 2022.*
section.heading: Rulemaking.
section.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, may issue rules to implement the provisions of this chapter.
section.codify:annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of § 4-773.06, see § 106 of Migrant Services and Supports Emergency Amendment Act of 2022 (D.C. Act 24-553, Sept. 30, 2022, 0 DCR 0).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 106 of Migrant Services and Supports Emergency Amendment Act of 2022 (D.C. Act 24-553, Sept. 30, 2022, 0 DCR 0).
